title: RuntimeError: cublas runtime error : library not initialized
body_html:
Report as below:
`
File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 710, in runfile
execfile(filename, namespace)

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 101, in execfile
exec(compile(f.read(), filename, 'exec'), namespace)

File "/home/lidh15/va/VA_Project-master/proj_demo/evaluate.py", line 116, in
main()

File "/home/lidh15/va/VA_Project-master/proj_demo/evaluate.py", line 112, in main
test(test_video_loader, test_audio_loader, model, opt)

File "/home/lidh15/va/VA_Project-master/proj_demo/evaluate.py", line 78, in test
cur_sim = model(vfeat_var, afeat_var)

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 224, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)

File "/home/lidh15/va/VA_Project-master/proj_demo/models.py", line 79, in forward
vfeat = F.relu(self.vfc(vfeat))

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 224, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/linear.py", line 53, in forward
return F.linear(input, self.weight, self.bias)

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 553, in linear
return torch.addmm(bias, input, weight.t())

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 924, in addmm
return cls._blas(Addmm, args, False)

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 920, in _blas
return cls.apply(*(tensors + (alpha, beta, inplace)))

File "/home/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/autograd/_functions/blas.py", line 26, in forward
matrix1, matrix2, out=output)

RuntimeError: cublas runtime error : library not initialized at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1503970438496/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c:405
`
What is the problem?
